title: aruLE ulagam
sahitya:
aruLE ulagam enbOm adan akhaNDa viLakkamE Aruyir vAzhkkaiyAm


anupallavi

  iruLinai nIkkiDum iravik-kadir pOlE engum cinmayamAgap-pongum param poruLin


caraNam    nUTra nUlin kaNDEneida puDavaiyAgum nulavum cintanaigaLE gavanam shei kaviyAgum
kATrin asaivE uyir kAkkum uyirppum Aghum kaDavuLin AnaiyAi iDam aghala virinda
